# ErrorResponse

**Object**

The error details that an API returns in the response body whenever the API request isn’t successful.

## Declaration

```swift
object ErrorResponse
```

## Objects

- **ErrorResponse.Errors**: The details about an error that are returned when an API request isn’t successful.
